title: This Wasn’t Supposed to Happen!
detail_text: <:th_ch0102/>Waaah....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Oh? What are you reading there, Riko-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Kyaaah!? K-, Karin-san!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Why are you that surprised? What’s that magazine you’re trying to hide~? Come on, show your big sis.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>N-, no! You can’t! This is umm, a magazine I’ve always longed for....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>....I see, something you’ve always “longed for”. I think I got it. It’s a fashion magazine, isn’t it?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Fashion....? Ah, y-, yeah! That’s right!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>So you’re also interested, huh, Riko-chan. I’m so happy. I’ve always thought you have the looks for it. Would you like to appear in one with me sometime?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Eeeh!? I- is that why you brought this up...?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>How about it?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Umm.... I’m not confident in that sort of thing....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Leave it to me! I’ll make you look absolutely stunning!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Eeeeeeh!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
